articles.title: DPRK's Stand on World Peace and Security Clarified
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand on World Peace and Security Clarified
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK who is leading the DPRK delegation, said at the plenary session of the 64th UN General Assembly on Sept. 28 that the DPRK government would fulfil all its responsibilities for defending peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world. 
					The DPRK has done all it could to achieve the peaceful reunification of the country, remove the nuclear threat and the source of war from the Korean Peninsula and bring about peace and stability, he noted, and went on to say: 
					
					Its efforts, however, have not met a response from the United States.
					
					The U.S. has dealt with the Korean issue only from the view of its Asia strategy and does not want to see the whole Korean Peninsula denuclearized. 
					
					Consequently, this only increased the nuclear threat to the DPRK. 
					
					The U.S. is behaving so arbitrarily that it asserts the DPRK should not be allowed to launch even a satellite for peaceful purposes, and the UN Security Council is being abused to serve its purpose.
					
					The conclusion the DPRK has drawn is that in order to preserve peace and stability in Northeast Asia at the present stage where the U.S. is not willing to make a switchover in its nuclear policy, the DPRK is left with no other option but to keep the nuclear equilibrium in the region by keeping dependable nukes.
					
					If the Korean Peninsula is to be denuclearized, it is necessary for the U.S. administration to discard its old view of confrontation and prove its stand to make a "switchover" in practice as it has stated on several occasions recently.
					
					 The DPRK does not pursue a nuclear arms race.
					
					 The mission of the DPRK's nuclear weapons is just to deter a war.
					
					The DPRK will have only nuclear deterrent strong enough to beat back a military attack on it and cope with such threat.
					
					As is the case with Europe and other parts of the world, on the Korean Peninsula, too, deterrent will be in direct proportion to threat. 
					
					While the DPRK keeps nuclear weapons, it will act in a responsible manner as regards their management and use and nuclear non-proliferation and disarmament.
					
					The DPRK shares the stand with all peace-loving countries including the non-aligned countries opposed to a nuclear war, nuclear arms race and nuclear proliferation.
					
					The DPRK is exposed to "sanctions" applied in the name of the UN for the mere reason that it has nuclear deterrent.
					
					 Such unreasonable and partial sanctions can neither be recognized nor accepted.
					
					 It is the DPRK government's stand to respond to dialogue with dialogue and react to "sanctions" with increased nuclear deterrent.
					
					If the United States intends to have dialogue, keeping "sanctions" ahead of it, the DPRK, too, will have dialogue, keeping the bolstering-up of its nuclear deterrence ahead of it.

articles.title: DPRK Calls for Developing South-South Cooperation
articles.content:
DPRK Calls for Developing South-South Cooperation
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to expand and develop the South-South cooperation. Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK who is heading its delegation, said this when addressing the foreign ministerial meeting of the group of 77 held at the UN Headquarters on Sept. 25 while the 64th UN General Assembly is in session.
					He recalled that the DPRK government has paid deep attention to boosting the South-South cooperation and taken an active part in the activities of the non-aligned movement, the group of 77 and the UN system, rendering disinterested support and exerting devoted efforts.
					
					He referred to the fact that the DPRK initiated cooperation projects in various fields including agriculture, bio-science, standardization  and measurement for different developing countries in Asia and Africa, and has made governmental efforts to implement them, gaining good experience and successes in this course.
					
					The DPRK government will as always creditably fulfil its responsibility and duty in establishing a new international economic order based on justice, equality and impartiality and further expanding and developing the South-South cooperation based on collective self-reliance, he declared.

articles.title: Reunion of Separated Families of North and South Closes
articles.content:
Reunion of Separated Families of North and South Closes
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The reunion of separated families and relatives from the north and the south of Korea that began at Mt. Kumgang Resort on Sept. 26 on the occasion of the Harvest Moon Day went on.
					Those from the north met with their kin from the south on Sept. 29. They were proud to tell their kin from the south that they have led a worthwhile life under the care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and rendered services for the building of a rich and powerful country despite their advanced ages. 
					
					They told their kin to take the lead in carrying out the sacred cause of reunification, saying that a nation-wide struggle of all the compatriots is the only way of bringing earlier national reunification.
					
					The south Korean Red Cross arranged a reception for the separated families and relatives of the north and the south on the same day. 
					
					On Wednesday, they spent a pleasant time, taking pictures and meals together.
					
					Before bidding farewell to their kin from the south on Thursday, those from the north promised them to actively turn out in the grand march for reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to bring the day when they will be able to live in happiness together.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets WIDF Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets WIDF Delegation
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with a delegation of the Women's International Democratic Federation led by President Marcia de Campos Pereira at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					On the occasion the president of the federation praised President Kim Il Sung as the great leader of the Korean people and the progressive humankind.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il has made great contribution to the development of humankind, she said.
					
					Noting that Korean-style socialism is a genuine society for people, she expressed the willingness to further strengthen solidarity with the women of the DPRK.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from WIDF Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from WIDF Delegation
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Women's International Democratic Federation.
					The gift was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday by Marcia de Campos Pereira, president of the federation, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message to Philippine President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message to Philippine President
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, President of Philippines, as regards tropical storm that hit the country recently, claiming huge human casualties and material losses.
					 Expressing deep sympathy and consolation to the victims and bereaved families, Kim in the message hoped that the government of Philippines would eradicate the aftermath of the disaster as early as possible.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Guinean President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Guinean President
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Moussa Dadis Camara, President of the Republic of Guinea, on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of the independence of his country.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Guinea would continue to develop, Kim in the message sincerely wished the Guinean president and people big successes in their work for the peace and stability of the country and national unity.

articles.title: Indoor Pool of Kim Il Sung Univ. Completed
articles.content:
Indoor Pool of Kim Il Sung Univ. Completed
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- An indoor swimming pool of Kim Il Sung University has been completed.
					The indoor swimming pool with a total floor space of 14,370 square meters has been built at the best level. It has a swimming pool with a diving tower, a wading pool with water slides, bath-cum-sauna facilities, a medical centre and others. 
					
					A ceremony for the completion of the indoor swimming pool took place on Sept. 30.
					
					Present there were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Il, premier of the Cabinet, Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the SPA, Choe Yong Rim, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education, officials concerned, soldier-builders of the Korean People's Security Forces and leading officials, teachers and students of the university.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop said in his address made for the occasion that General Secretary Kim Jong Il initiated the construction of this indoor swimming pool and indicated the orientation of the project and ways to do so and energetically guided its construction, prompted by the desire to provide the teachers and students of the university with better conditions for cultural recreation.
					
					The speaker recalled that Kim Jong Il visited the newly-built swimming pool last March and expressed great satisfaction over the well-done design and construction, indicating ways to set up the diving tower and spruce up the university under a long-term plan.
					
					The leader visited the completed indoor swimming pool once again and showed the great loving care by learning about how the diving tower was laid and watching students' swimming training, he noted.

articles.title: 7th National Korean Dress Show
articles.content:
7th National Korean Dress Show
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The 7th National Korean Dress Show was held recently at the Central Youth Hall on the bank of the River Taedong flowing through Pyongyang.
					Present at the show were scores of units from Pyongyang and local areas, including the Garment Institute under the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry and the Korea Unha General Trading Corporation.
					
					On display at the show were more than 1,300 suits of Korean clothes such as everyday clothes, holiday best, wedding dress and children's clothes and various fashions of clothes according to the seasons.
					
					Catching the eyes of the visitors were Korean costumes exhibited by the Songhu Quality Tailor's Shop in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province, which finished first at the show.
					
					The tailor's shop made its exhibits with silk fabrics loved by the Koreans. They were well harmonized with decent, tidy and elegant colors and decorated with hand-embroidery, gold leaf, beads and pictures to show the gracefulness and beauty of the Korean costume.
					
					The Garment Institute under the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry presented Korean chima (skirt) and jogori (coat) suited to the national sentiment of the Korean people who like faint and gentle colors to win the popularity of the visitors.
					
					Short courses, a scientific paper presentation and other events were held under the sponsorship of the Korean Apparel Association.
					
					Pak Hyon Sik, secretary general of the Korean Apparel Association, told KCNA that the show contributed to further deepening the research into and dissemination of the Korean costume and to developing the fine dressing culture of the nation in accordance with the aesthetic sense of the Songun era.

articles.title: DPRK Exhibition Opened in China
articles.content:
DPRK Exhibition Opened in China
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book, photo and fine art exhibition was opened with due ceremony at the Library of the Capital of Beijing on Sept. 29 to mark the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and China. 
					Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were celebrated works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photos and fine art works introducing the history of the development of the DPRK-China friendly relations, spectacular scenery of Korea and happiness of the Korean people.
					
					Present at the ceremony were the vice-minister of Culture of China, officials concerned, popular masses and Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, his embassy officials and the delegation of the DPRK book, photo and fine art exhibition on a visit to China.
					
					The vice-minister of Culture of China said at the ceremony that it is very auspicious to hold in Beijing and Pyongyang exhibitions showing the history of the development of friendly relations between the two countries and successes achieved in building socialist culture on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of the bilateral diplomatic relations.
					
					The bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation have been steadily consolidated and brisk exchange and cooperation conducted in the field of culture under the care of the top leaders of the two countries, the speaker noted. Stressing that the exhibition would offer the Chinese people an opportunity to know better about achievements made by the Korean people in socialist construction and their peculiar customs and promote the understanding between the peoples of the two countries, the vice-minister hoped that the exhibition would achieve good success and the China-DPRK friendship would last forever.
					
					The DPRK ambassador to China said that the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries was a significant event that opened a new chapter of the history of bilateral friendship. The exhibition will showcase well the true picture of Songun Korea vigorously advancing with the might of single-minded unity under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and the friendly feelings of the Korean people toward the Chinese people and thus successfully decorate the "year of DPRK-China friendship". 
					
					At the end of the ceremony, the participants looked round the books, photos and fine art works on display.

articles.title: Undying Feats for Development of Juche-Oriented Education
articles.content:
Undying Feats for Development of Juche-Oriented Education
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A great change is taking place in the efforts for building a great, prosperous and powerful nation in Korea this year, opening a brighter prospect for the development of the Juche-oriented education.
					In the annals of the DPRK in which revolutionary changes were effected, the education of Juche also made giant strides forward.
					
					In Juche 36 (1947) when the Korean people over-fulfilled the first national economic plan with their own strength and wisdom, the number of schools and students grew respectively by 40 percent and 30 percent as against the previous year.
					
					World-startling changes took place in the field of education. The DPRK enforced the universal compulsory primary education system for the first time in 1956 when it successfully concluded the postwar rehabilitation and construction, frustrating the sophism of the U.S. imperialists that the DPRK would not stand on its own feet within 100 years, the universal compulsory secondary education system in 1958 when the socialist system was established, the universal 9-year compulsory technical education system in the 1960s when miracles were wrought in  Chollima Korea and the universal 11-year free and compulsory education system in the 1970s when a rapid progress was made in the economic construction at the "speed of the 70-day campaign." 
					
					This year Juche-oriented education is registering big achievements in its activities through the 150-day campaign for a new great revolutionary upsurge.
					
					A solid foundation for the Juche-oriented education was laid and many successes were made in the training of talented personnel through the working out of teaching program, shows and contests held in the IT and other fields, researches into cutting-edge science, large-scaled construction and reconstruction of schools, improved production and supply of educational instruments, writing of hundreds of kinds of textbooks and reference books, powerful nation-wide assistance to education.
					
					It is entirely thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il that more rosy future is promised for the education of the rising generation.
					
					He visited the then Wonsan University of Agriculture while guiding the 150-day campaign on the spot. Then he was greatly pleased to see another powerful education and research centre for raising technical personnel and gave important instructions for the development of education.
					
					His warm love for the generations to come was shown not only to the newly built greenhouse of the university, but also to Sojung Secondary School in Rakwon County and Munchon Secondary School in Munchon City during the 150-day campaign.
					
					The new solid foundation for the development of the Juche-oriented education and all the achievements made in the education and training of revolutionary personnel in the period of 150-day campaign are the fruition of the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Celebrates Chinese Birthday
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Celebrates Chinese Birthday
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Korean people extend warm congratulations to the friendly Chinese people significantly celebrating the 60th anniversary of the People's Republic of China, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a by-lined article.
					The birth of the PRC, the first people's power in China, ushered in the history of building a free, new life of the Chinese nation, the article notes, and goes on to say:
					
					The Chinese people are now working hard to build a harmonious socialist society based on the scientific outlook on development and achieve the reunification of the whole country under the leadership of the Communist Party of China with Hu Jintao as its general secretary.
					
					The Korean people heartily hope that the Chinese people would achieve greater successes in their future work.
					
					The peoples of the two countries have closely supported and cooperated with each other in the common struggle for socialist construction and independence and peace against imperialism.
					
					The traditional DPRK-China friendship is favorably developing day by day under the deep care of the leaders of the two countries.
					
					It is the consistent stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to steadily strengthen the DPRK-China friendly relations.
					
					The WPK and the DPRK government will as ever make positive efforts to further develop the traditional DPRK-China friendship, legacy of the revolutionaries of the elder generation of the two countries and common wealth of the two peoples.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on International Day of Old Persons
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on International Day of Old Persons
Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Today the DPRK is purposefully taking necessary measures for the old persons and putting them into practice.
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article dedicated to International Day of Old Persons.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The reality, in which the old population is on a steady increase,  demands more social and state care and increased investment for the protection of health of old persons.
					
					In capitalist countries where the almighty dollar principle dominates, many old persons are forsaken by their families and society due to the corrupt lifestyle and immoral practices influenced by misanthropy. They are denied medical treatment even though they suffer from illness and some of them are even taking their own lives, finding it hard to make a living.
					
					The Central Committee of the Federation for the Care of the Elderly of Korea is active in the DPRK. The organization conducts in a unified way the work to protect old persons, considering it as an important mission of the state. It is striving to strengthen relationship and cooperation with relevant international organizations as regards the issues on the population aging and the care for the elderly.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Suk's Demise Commemorated in Nigeria
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Suk's Demise Commemorated in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a bulletin on Sept. 22 to commemorate the 60th anniversary of demise of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					The bulletin in an article said that 60 years have passed since the demise of Kim Jong Suk who was one of the outstanding great persons of modern Korea but the Korean people always keep the memory of her.
					
					It gave a detailed account of the facts that she protected President Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life, regarding him as the heart and brain of the Korean revolution, energetically worked to implement the plan and will of the President, visiting various parts of the country after the liberation, and devoted her all to comrades with warm humanity and total devotion as her natural disposition.
					
					The greatest exploit performed by Kim Jong Suk was that she made sure that steady continuity was given to the cause of the President, the bulletin noted, adding that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has firmly defended socialism in the DPRK true to the will of his mother and ushered in a new era of building a great prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: Juche Study Forum Formed in India
articles.content:
Juche Study Forum Formed in India
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The India Haryana Forum for Juche Studies was inaugurated.
					 Bharat Bhushan Bagga, advocate of the Haryana State Court, was elected chairman of the forum.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige labores de varios dominios de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige labores de varios dominios de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno las labores de varios dominios de la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					Primeramente, estuvo en la Fabrica de Siluro de Pyongyang.
					
					Tras escuchar la explicacion sobre la gestion de la fabrica el Dirigente recorrio durante varias horas los procesos productivos enterandose detalladamente del estado de equipos tecnicos y de produccion.
					
					Al ver los siluros engordados que pululan en las piscinas se mostro muy satisfecho de que en los ultimos anos los obreros de la fabrica producen innovaciones sin precedentes en la cria de peces.
					
					En particular, en pleno acato a la orientacion del partido en materia de registrar viraje en la cria de pececillos de buena variedad los funcionarios y tecnicos de la planta incrementaron rapidamente la produccion de peces, lo cual es un gran exito, dijo y evaluo altamente los meritos de ellos que hicieron un gran aporte al desarrollo de piscicultura y les dio agradecimiento.
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia para aumentar con rapidez la produccion de siluros.
					
					Senalo que para que el pueblo pudiera comer con mas apetito el siluro criado con tantos esfuerzos es preciso hallar diversos metodos de cocina y agrego que hay que prestar profunda atencion a la investigacion al respecto.
					
					 El Dirigente Kim Jong Il dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica 7 de Diciembre.
					
					 Despues de recorrer la sala de presentacion del historial se cercioro de los detalles del estado de produccion en varios procesos.
					
					Tras ver los lugares de trabajo arreglados de manera ordenada y distintos productos, expreso gran satisfaccion de que los obreros de la fabrica normalizan en alto nivel la produccion y evaluo altamente sus meritos.
					
					Subrayando que son muy importantes el deber y papel de esta planta en la mejora de la vida del pueblo, presento las tareas que incumben a la fabrica.
					
					A continuacion, el Dirigente recorrio el recien perfeccionado Centro de Natacion de la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					
					Al ver esta piscina construida maravillosamente, reconocio los esfuerzos de los constructores militares calificandola de perfecta.
					
					Seguidamente, presencio el entrenamiento de natacion de los estudiantes.
					
					Senalo que esta instalacion deportiva dispone de equipos de alto nivel y modernas facilidades de servicio publico de toda indole, de modo que los profesores, empleados y estudiantes puedan forjar en lo suficiente su constitucion fisica y tomar el descanso cultural y se entablen hasta las competencias internacionales.
					
					Continuo que en la figura jovial y alegre de los miembros de las generaciones venideras, futuro de la patria, estan nuestro placer y felicidad y el valor de hacer la revolucion.
					
					Tras averiguar como marcha la construccion de la biblioteca de la Universidad, indico las tareas que se presentan para asegurar el maximo nivel de esta obra.
					
					Dijo en tono orgulloso que nuestra economia independiente crece ahora como gigante mostrando patentemente su enorme potencialidad.
					
					Ahora vemos mejores perspectivas y frutos tan jugosos que nunca hemos visto en la historia de construccion de una gran potencia prospera, subrayo y prosiguio que en este periodo conmovedor, en que se nos acerca el gran triunfo, debemos acelerar nuestro avance para adelantar en todo lo posible el dia historico en que repercuta el tamboreo de victoria que declarara la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que la ciudad de Pyongyang desempenara el papel de vanguardia marchando al frente en la gran causa para construir una gran potencia prospera.
					
					El Dirigente fue acompanado por el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes y primeros subjefes de departamento y otros cuadros del CC del PTC.

articles.title: RPDC se esforzara por mundo desnuclearizado
articles.content:
RPDC se esforzara por mundo desnuclearizado
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- A la pregunta formulada el dia 30 por un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea en relacion con que recientemente tuvo lugar la cumbre de los paises miembros del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, el portavoz del Ministerio de  Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea respondio como sigue:
					El 24 de septiembre, los jefes de los paises miembros del CS de la ONU se reunieron en Nueva York donde discutieron los problemas de la no proliferacion de las armas nucleares y la reduccion de armas nucleares y aprobaron la resolucion No. 1887 del CS sobre la construccion del "mundo sin armas nucleares".
					
					El problema es que la presente resolucion es tambien el documento de doble rasero que refleja suficientemente el anhelo y la voluntad de la sociedad internacional en su conjunto.
					
					En esta cita debe ser cuestionada y debatida debidamente la realidad en que debido a la amenaza nuclear de Estados Unidos a los paises desprovistos de armas nucleares se violan y se destruyen la paz y la estabilidad de varias regiones del mundo.
					
					A decir verdad, primeramente, los paises poseedores de la mayor cantidad de armas nucleares deben reducirlas y  desmantelarlas, lo cual es una condicion previa para realizar la desnuclearizacion del mundo.
					
					La presente resolucion, que desprecia los importantes problemas reales y enumera solo las demandas unilaterales de las potencias nucleares a otros paises, no pasa de ser una maniobra astuta de las potencias nucleares tendentes a mantener su hegemonia por el monopolio nuclear bajo el rotulo de la desnuclearizacion del mundo.
					
					Para defender el interes supremo del pais y  preservar la paz y la seguridad de la region frente al despotismo y las arbitrariedades consistentes en pisotear hasta el derecho al desarrollo pacifico de nuestro pueblo, que vivia durante mas de medio siglo bajo la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU., el pueblo coreano no puede menos de tener la fuerza disuasiva nuclear.
					
					Ya hemos rechazado totalmente las resoluciones del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU inventadas injustamente acusando nuestras justas medidas de autodefensa.
					
					Mientras existen los factores que nos empujaron a tener las armas nucleares, no se puede pensar ni en suenos en la renuncia a estos artefactos por parte de nuestro pais.
					
					Es mucho menos concebible que nuestro pais ingrese de nuevo en condicion de Estado desnuclearizado al Tratado de No Proliferacion que no hizo nada para frenar el despliegue de armas nucleares en el frente por EE.UU. y la creciente amenaza nuclear de este sobre la Peninsula Coreana  y fue utilizado al contrario en la campana de EE.UU. para aislar y atropellar a la RPDC.
					
					Tambien, rechazamos totalmente la resolucion No. 1887 del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU imbuida de la ambicion dominacionista de las potencias nucleares y no nos comprometeremos ni un comino a ella.
					
					La desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el proyecto de construccion del mundo sin armas nucleares han sido propuestos hace mucho tiempo por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y nuestro pueblo anhela vivir en un mundo pacifico y libre de armas nucleares.
					
					Tambien en el futuro al igual que en el pasado, la RPDC seguira esforzandose por construir un mundo exento de armas nucleares y desnuclearizar la Peninsula Coreana en vinculacion con la politica nuclear de EE.UU. sobre Corea.

articles.title: RPDC cumplira su responsabilidad por preservar paz y seguridad
articles.content:
RPDC cumplira su responsabilidad por preservar paz y seguridad 
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cumplira toda su responsabilidad por preservar la paz y la seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo.
					Asi destaco el vicecanciller Pak Kil Yon, jefe de la delegacion coreana, haciendo uso de la palabra en el pleno del 64o periodo de las sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU efectuado el 28 de septiembre.
					
					 La RPDC hizo todo lo que este a su alcance por lograr la reunificacion pacifica del pais, eliminar la amenaza nuclear y la fuente de la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y preparar alli la paz y la estabilidad, dijo y continuo:
					
					 Pero, tales esfuerzos nuestros no disfrutaron del apoyo de EE.UU.
					
					Este pais americano observa el problema coreano solo en el punto de vista de su estrategia hacia Asia y no desea la desnuclearizacion de toda la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 En fin de cuentas, se aumento mas la amenaza nuclear a la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. actua arbitrariamente insistiendo en que la RPDC no debe lanzar ni el satelite con fines pacificos y el CS de la ONU se utiliza mal para este objeto.
					
					Como resultado, la RPDC llego a la conclusion de que en la etapa actual en que EE.UU no quiere cambiar su politica nuclear no hay otra alternativa que asegurar el equilibrio nuclear de la region mediante las fidedignas armas nucleares nuestras para mantener la paz y la estabilidad del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Para realizar la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana es preciso que la administracion norteamericana abandone su vieja concepcion de enfrentamiento y muestre con practica su posicion del "cambio" como lo declaraba recientemente en varias ocasiones.
					
					 No perseguimos la carrera armamentista nuclear.
					
					 Nuestras armas nucleares toman por la mision  frenar la guerra.
					
					Poseeremos solo el disuasivo nuclear necesario a detener el ataque y amenaza militares a nuestro pais.
					
					 Al igual que en la Europa y las demas regiones, tambien en la Peninsula Coreana la amenaza y el disuasivo estaran en las relaciones de proporcion directa. 
					
					 Mientras que tiene esos artefactos, la RPDC actuara con responsabilidad en la administracion, el uso y la no proliferacion de dichas armas y en el problema de reduccion nuclear.
					
					La RPDC comparte la posicion con los paises no alineados y otros amantes de la paz que se oponen a la guerra nuclear, la carrera armamentista nuclear y la proliferacion de las armas nucleares.
					
					 Ahora, la RPDC es el objeto de la "sancion" de la ONU por haber poseido el disuasivo nuclear.
					
					 Este acto injusto y desigual no sera reconocido ni  aceptado jamas.
					
					La posicion del gobierno de la RPDC es responder con el dialogo al dialogo y con el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear a la "sancion".
					
					Si EE.UU. trata de hacer el dialogo anteponiendo la "sancion", tambien la RPDC le tratara con el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear.

articles.title: Pak Kil Yon ratifica en la ONU la invariable posicion de la RPDC
articles.content:
Pak Kil Yon ratifica en la ONU la invariable posicion de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- En la reunion de cancilleres del "Grupo de los 77" efectuada el 25 de septiembre en la sede de la ONU durante el 64o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, el vicecanciller Pak Kil Yon, jefe de la delegacion coreana, subrayo en su discurso que es invariable la posicion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de ampliar y desarrollar la cooperacion Sur-Sur.
					Dijo que el gobierno de la RPDC presto profunda atencion al fortalecimiento de la cooperacion Sur-Sur y vino brindando su apoyo y esfuerzos desinteresados tomando parte activa en las actividades del Movimiento de los Paises No Alineados, el "Grupo de los 77" y el sistema de la ONU.
					
					Prosiguio que la RPDC tomo la iniciativa de los planes de cooperacion en varias ramas como la agricultura, la biologia, la estandarizacion y la medicion, etc. para varios paises en vias de desarrollo de Asia y Africa y obtuvo buenas experiencias y exitos en sus esfuerzos gubernamentales por implementar esos planes.
					
					Subrayo que en lo adelante tambien, el gobierno de la RPDC cumplira con toda su responsabilidad y deber en establecer el nuevo orden economico internacional basandose en la justicia, igualdad e imparcialidad y en ampliar y desarrollar mas la cooperacion Sur-Sur en base de la autoconfianza colectiva.

articles.title: Terminado encuentro entre familiares y parientes separados
articles.content:
Terminado encuentro entre familiares y parientes separados 
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo continuado el encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados del Norte y el Sur de Corea iniciado el 26 de septiembre en el monte Kumgang con motivo de Chusok (fiesta otonal).
					Los familiares y parientes de la parte nortena hicieron el dia 29 el encuentro con los de la parte surena.
					
					Ellos dijeron con orgullo a los de la parte surena que venian gozando de la vida digna en el regazo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y aunque ahora son envejecidos, hacen contribucion a la construccion de la patria prospera.
					
					Prosiguieron que solo la lucha nacional de todos los coreanos puede adelantar la reunificacion de la patria y les encomendaron que se pongan en la cabeza del cumplimiento de la sagrada causa para la reunificacion.
					
					El mismo dia, la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea ofrecio un banquete en honor de los familiares y parientes separados de ambas partes.
					
					El 30 de septiembre, los familiares y parientes del Norte y el Sur se reunieron otra vez y pasaron la hora alegre fotografiandose y compartiendo la comida.
					
					El primer dia de octubre, al despedirse ellos se prometieron a levantarse activamente en la gran marcha para la reunificacion bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre a fin de adelantar el dia en que viviran juntos felizmente.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo a la presidenta filipina
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo a la presidenta filipina
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el 29 de septiembre un telegrama de consuelo a Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, presidenta de la Republica de Filipinas en relacion con que recientemente, este pais sufrio muchos danos humanos y materiales  debido al ciclon tropical.
					En su misiva el remitente expresa su profunda simpatia y consuelo a los danados y sus familiares, y desea a la destinataria que el gobierno filipino eliminara cuanto antes las consecuencias de los presentes danos.
